      • startManagerService

        public static void startManagerService(Context context,
                                       CaInterface.OnConnectionManagerStateListener onConnectionManagerStateListener)
        Method start connection manager service. this method has to be called before other API call.
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        onConnectionManagerStateListener - connection state callback listener

      • stopManagerService

        public static void stopManagerService()
        Method stop connection manager service. this method must be called, when Application is destroied.

      • setAutoConnectionDevice

        public static void setAutoConnectionDevice(java.lang.String address)
                                    throws OcException
        Method set device information for Auto-Connection. this method has to be called before FindResource is called.
        Parameters:
        address - LE address of scanned bluetooth device.
        Throws:
        OcException - If the connection manager is not initalized. Check that startManagerService was called.

      • unsetAutoConnectionDevice

        public static void unsetAutoConnectionDevice(java.lang.String address)
                                      throws OcException
        Method unset device information for Auto-Connection.
        Parameters:
        address - LE address of scanned bluetooth device.
        Throws:
        OcException - If the connection manager is not initalized. Check that startManagerService was called.

      • startBtPairingService

        public static void startBtPairingService(Context context,
                                         CaInterface.OnBtDeviceFoundListener listener)
        start bluetooth pairing service.
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        listener - listener callback called when the bluetooth device is found

      • stopBtPairingService

        public static void stopBtPairingService()
        stop bluetooth pairing service.

      • startScan

        public static void startScan()
                      throws OcException
        start bluetooth device scan.
        Throws:
        OcException - If bluetooth pairing has not been initialized. Check that startBtPairingService has been called.

      • stopScan

        public static void stopScan()
                     throws OcException
        stop bluetooth device scan.
        Throws:
        OcException - If bluetooth pairing has not been initialized. Check that startBtPairingService has been called.

      • createBond

        public static void createBond(BluetoothDevice device)
                       throws OcException
        create bond
        Parameters:
        device - bluetooth device
        Throws:
        OcException - If bluetooth pairing has not been initialized. Check that startBtPairingService has been called.

      • setLeScanIntervalTime

        public static void setLeScanIntervalTime(int intervalTime,
                                         int workingCount)
        set BLE scan interval time and working count. scanning logic ("start scan" to "stop scan") will be worked repeatly for workingCount. and if you choose '0' value for workingCount parameter, scanning will be worked continually as interval time.
        Parameters:
        intervalTime - interval time(Seconds).
        workingCount - working count with interval time.

      • stopLeScan

        public static void stopLeScan()
        stop BLE scan. if you want to start scan, it can be triggered by setLeScanIntervalTime or other request API like findResource.

      • startLeAdvertising

        public static void startLeAdvertising()
        start BLE Advertising. precondition : since android gatt server in IoTivity doesn't start to advertise by default. (it can prevent battery consumption issue) ble adv flag should be set to enable flag, if you want to use this method. we provide BT configure setter API which has ble adv flag like below method 'void setBTConfigure(...)' it should be set before call init ocstack like PlatformConfig setter. 1. gatt server stop advertisement after connect with someone by default. thur, you should call this method, if you want to connect others continuously. 2. if you want to start advertisement in initialization step, you can call just setBTConfigure API. since advertisement will be triggered by the flag, when gatt server is started. to conclude, you don't need to call startLeAdvertising API, if adv enable flag is set in setBTConfigure API.

      • stopLeAdvertising

        public static void stopLeAdvertising()
        stop BLE Advertising. it can stop to advertise le for gatt server even though there is no connected endpoint. it will help to reduce battery consumption, when someone doesn't want to advertise by user scenario. if you want to stop advertiment in initialize step. you can call just setBTConfigure API with adv disable flag.

      • setBTConfigure

        public static void setBTConfigure(int flag)
        set BT configure flags for BLE transport 0: default BT flag 0x1: disable BLE advertisement. 0x2: enable BLE advertisement. (1 << 4): disable gatt server. (1 << 7): disable EDR transport.
        Parameters:
        flag - use value indicated above

      • setCipherSuite

        public static int setCipherSuite(OicCipher cipher,
                                 OcConnectivityType connType)

      • setConnectionUserConfig

        public static void setConnectionUserConfig(CaIpConnectionPreference connPriority)
        Set Connection Manager configuration. It can be set a connection manager configuration.(default: CA_CLOUD)
        Parameters:
        connPriority - User Preference of connectivity channel for connection manager
